title: What was the number one song on June 3, 1983? - Quora

response.answer_text: In the UK the number one record from 4th, June 1983 was “Flashdance” by Irene Cara. So, technically, the number one record the day before on 3rd. June 1983 was “Let’s Dance” by David Bowie. “Let’s Dance” was number one for two weeks from 21st. May 1983. My source was UK Number Ones from the UK Singles Chart Hits
